transform-it.js

Javascript library to rotate & translate anything on your page, easily!

Core features

  • + Works for mouse and touch devices
  • + Very easy to implement
  • + ..kb
  • + 60fps with minimalization of executions
  • + Natural easing out of the box
  • + Create kickass rotations

Implementation is as easy as

app.create('.classSelector');

Click a button to activate or deactivate a transform.
Drag anywhere to transform the mobile phone!
